QuestData.Title: Chasing the Chicken
QuestData.Description: Say, you there! $n, was it? I've got a problem, and I need someone with better legs than mine to help me solve it.$b$bMy prize-winning chicken has flown the coop! Now she's out in the open, mingling with the other hens, wild birds, and... <gulp> ill-intentioned roosters.$b$bMy farm is west of here, south of the Skyrange. Could you find her, and bring her back to me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Pick up Hillpaw's Chickens until you find his Prize-Winning Chicken.
